claims_summary: Advanced aircraft development division with history of decades-long classification (F-117 example), alleged Aurora hypersonic program, Ben Rich claims of exotic/UAP technology access

documented_programs: U-2 spy plane (1955): CIA contracts, flight records, Gary Powers shootdown
SR-71 Blackbird (1964): Air Force reconnaissance, now publicly documented
F-117 Nighthawk: First flew 1981, classified until 1988 reveal (7-year concealment)
Have Blue: F-117 demonstrator program, declassified documents available
Kelly Johnson autobiography and technical papers document development process
classification_pattern: F-117 precedent: Operational aircraft concealed for 7 years
U-2 revealed only after shootdown forced disclosure
Special Access Programs: Compartmented clearances limit oversight
Black budget: Classified appropriations for Skunk Works programs
Congressional testimony: Limited even to oversight committees with clearances
aurora_allegations: Hypersonic reconnaissance aircraft: Persistent rumors, aviation observer reports
Strange sonic booms: Southern California, 1990s (attributed to Aurora by witnesses)
Budget analysis: Aviation experts identify unexplained classified appropriations
Official denials: Air Force and Lockheed deny Aurora exists
Circumstantial evidence: Pulse detonation engine patents, unusual contrails
ben_rich_uap_claims: 1993 UCLA speech: 'We now have the technology to take ET home' (witnessed, disputed interpretation)
Deathbed statements (1995): Alleged claims about UFO technology (second-hand accounts)
Jan Harzan testimony: MUFON director claims Rich told him 'we found an error in the equations'
Interpretation disputes: Skeptics say metaphorical, believers claim literal exotic tech
No official Lockheed confirmation or denial of UAP technology programs
concealment_mechanisms: Contractor status: Private company shields from some FOIA
Plausible deniability: Officials deny programs that may exist
Classification duration: Decades pass before public disclosure
Facility security: Area 51, Palmdale Plant 42 restricted access

validation_status: Historical programs (U-2, SR-71, F-117) extensively documented - Aurora remains unconfirmed despite persistent evidence - Ben Rich UAP claims second-hand and disputed interpretation
